title: Energy investment of £28bn approved by regulator Ofgem
description: Ofgem says the investment will help lower reliance on imported gas and make wholesale energy cheaper.
content:
Ofgem chief executive Jonathan Brearley said the investment "will keep Britain's energy network among the safest, most secure and resilient in the world".
Speaking to BBC's Breakfast programme, Mr B… [+1899 chars]
